page.title: 18Transport around North Leigh
page.content: The area in our D-block is very rural. North Leigh is the only village within the block. As there are not many amenities there, people have to travel into Oxford or Witney to get what they want.In North Leigh cars are necessary for getting around.There are not many shops there, so people use cars for travelling around.North Leigh doesn't have a regular bus service. However most people in North leigh own cars.The area around North leigh is a farming area.There are many farmers and they use land rovers to travel around, as they are rough teritory vehicles. Farmers use them for getting to the animals and the fields in bad weather. The tracks are very muddy and very rough,and it would be difficult to use them without a landrover. by Michael Cassidy and Robert Baker
